games.title: Online Car Destruction Simulator 3D
games.description: 3D Online Car Destruction Simulator is an adrenaline-pumping game that emphasizes realistic vehicle crashes. Players can enjoy demolition chaos in immersive settings, driving various cars with intricate damage effects. Engage in thrilling multiplayer action, and experience this free game on mobile and desktop, no downloads required.
games.howToPlayText:
Controls:
TAB - pause menu (or Escape)

Moving W (forward), S (backward), A (left), D (right).
Spacebar - handbrake.
Shift - nitro.
C - change camera.
U - free camera.
R - reset car.
K - restore car.
B - slow down time.
N - switch car.

For mobile devices, use the game interface.

The goal of the game: just dride and crash cars as you like ;)

games.title: Echolocation Shooter
games.description:
Shoot to see in the dark!

Eliminate all the neon enemies, in the horroristic level!

The only way to see in this FPS is to generate soundwave with your weapon.

Survive endless waves of the wide variety of neon monster enemies, where the only way to see is to shoot.
Unleash soundwave rifles, laser cannons, and grenades to light up the battlefield, upgrade your gear, and fight deeper into the horroristic horde.

Every shot reveals the world‚Äîevery wave pushes your limits.
games.howToPlayText:
Desktop:
Movement: Arrows, A, W, S, D
Jump: Space
Dodge: Shift

Interact with environment: Left-click

Generate Soundwave: Left-click
Activate Weapon: Right-click
Shoot: Right-click

Change Weapon: 1, 2, Mouse-scroll
Grenade: G

Menu: P

Mobile:
Buttons

games.title: Bow Brawls
games.description:
Bow Brawls ‚Äì Top-Down Archery Battles!

Enter Bow Brawls, a thrilling archery survival game where you aim with drag controls that feel like a real bow. Pull, release, and strike down endless waves of enemies! Each wave ends with a powerful boss fight, forcing you to master skill and strategy.

Unlock 5 unique bows, 5 armors, and 5 arenas as you progress. Every weapon and battleground adds a new style of play. Face bosses with special abilities and prove your reflexes in intense battles.

Compete with players worldwide through global leaderboards. Show off your best scores and climb to the top to become the ultimate archer.

Perfect for casual players, kids, and competitive gamers, Bow Brawls is easy to pick up yet challenging to master. Endless action, exciting unlocks, and competitive spirit await you.

üéØ Aim true. ‚öî Defeat bosses. üëë Rule the leaderboard.
Play Bow Brawls now and test your archery skills!
games.howToPlayText:
How to Play

In Bow Brawls, survive endless waves of enemies using skill and precision. Use the joystick (mobile) or WASD (PC) to move. Aim by pulling the on-screen joystick in the opposite direction of your target‚Äîrelease to shoot arrows like a real bow.

Enemies attack from all directions, including melee fighters and ranged shooters. Every few waves, a boss appears with unique skills like dashing, jumping over you, or launching projectiles‚Äîstay alert and adapt!

Defeat bosses to earn gems, which unlock new bows and armors with different abilities. Reach higher scores to unlock new arenas and face tougher challenges.

Your score is based on enemy kills, with each type rewarding different points. Climb the leaderboards by defeating as many enemies as possible. Manage your health bar carefully‚Äîyou only get one life per run.

Master your aim, survive waves, defeat bosses, and rise as the ultimate archer!

games.description: Penalty Challenge is a thrilling online sports game that allows you to play as a striker or goalkeeper. Compete for free against AI or global players, earn points, and rise in rankings. Choose from top European clubs or national teams, showcasing your talent in an electrifying atmosphere.
games.howToPlayText:
Penalty Kicks: Striker or Goalkeeper?
Challenge the AI or players from around the world to earn experience points and climb the global leaderboard!

Choose a team from among the strongest clubs in Europe and European national teams to enter a high-level competition and show your talent!

You can play with your footballer, either male or female, as a striker or a goalkeeper: put your skills to the test amid the stadium smoke and the cheering crowd!

games.title: SWAT and GREENS vs Zombies
games.description: Engage in SWAT and GREENS vs Zombies, a thrilling strategy game where you defend humanity from a zombie apocalypse. Enjoy online gameplay without downloads, equip over 50 unique weapons, and face endless undead waves. Test your skills in various modes and strive for victory in PvP battles.
games.howToPlayText:
"SWAT & GREENS vs Zombies" is an engaging tower defense strategy game where you can upgrade and unlock new members of the SWAT squad as well as plants. Together, they will stand against waves of advancing zombies.

 Upgrade SWAT members and plants to create a stronger squad.
- Each member of the special forces squad comes equipped with unique weaponry, strategically position them on the battlefield.
- Every plant has a cooldown period; use their powers wisely in combat.
- Strive to minimize losses in battle to maximize the level completion reward.

Battle Controls:
Drag SWAT members and plants onto the field by holding down the left mouse button/touchscreen.

games.title: Archery Master - Castle Battle
games.description: Defend your castle in Archery Master - Castle Battle! Battle orcs, monsters, and the undead in this epic archery game. Upgrade archers, use special arrows, and conquer kingdoms in action-packed tower defense warfare!
games.howToPlayText:
¬´Archery Master - Castle Battle¬ª is an exciting archery game! Grab your bow and arrows and prepare for battle!  

You have a tower armed with skilled archers, and it‚Äôs up to you to defend your castle. Aim carefully with your bow and don‚Äôt miss your targets! 

The battle unfolds between the castle and the advancing army! Your mission is to destroy all enemies. Be warned: enemy troops may outnumber yours, their weapons are stronger, and their projectiles are more destructive!
Every shot counts‚Äîuse them wisely if you want to claim victory! 

Conquering all the kingdoms won‚Äôt be easy. You‚Äôll face orcs, humans, monsters, and the undead! Upgrade your archers, recruit mercenaries, use different types of arrows, apply poisons, and victory will be yours! 

Game Features:  
- Unique gameplay mechanics  
- Simple and intuitive controls  
- A variety of arrows and poisons to use  
- A variety of enemies to battle: orcs, humans, monsters, and undead
- Dozens of challenging levels  
- Upgradable archer bastion
     

Controls:    
- Tap to fire arrows

games.title: Fortress of the Sinister
games.description: Dive into the thrilling world of *Fortress of the Sinister*, a 3D strategy game filled with tactical gameplay and challenges. Lead a diverse team through intricate fortresses, face enemies in turn-based combat, gather resources, enhance abilities, and uncover secrets in this engaging online adventure for mobile and PC.
games.howToPlayText:
Fortress of Sinister is a groundbreaking 3D strategy game that masterfully blends tactical depth with pulse-pounding challenges. Lead your team of powerful characters through four formidable fortresses, each brimming with unique enemies and obstacles. Outwit your foes in dynamic, turn-based battles set on grid-based arenas, and uncover the secrets lurking within the shadows.

Game Objectives
- Short-term: Win battles with clever tactics and minimal losses.
- Mid-term: Build an elite team to conquer 10 floors in each fortress.
- Long-term: Strengthen your characters to face endless challenges in ultimate survival mode.

Features
- Turn-Based Combat: Engage in tactical battles on arenas of varying sizes, from 3x3 skirmishes to epic 7x7 confrontations.
- Diverse Characters: Recruit unique units like the ‚ÄúMushroom Priest,‚Äù ‚ÄúStone Golem,‚Äù and ‚ÄúNight Hunter,‚Äù each with distinct abilities to amplify your strategy.
- Loot & Progression: Collect treasures, trinkets, and currency after each floor to purchase items and upgrade your team‚Äôs skills.
- Meta-Progression: Unlock new characters and upgrades, ensuring your team is ready for escalating challenges.


- Keyboard
Use the mouse to play the game.
all movement takes place at the expense of the mouse.
You won't need any buttons.
Complete the training at the beginning of the game to figure out exactly how it works.

games.title: Monster Merge: Legends Alive
games.description: Monster Merge: Legends Alive is a fun puzzle game where you combine monsters to score points and advance. Playable online for free, it features engaging gameplay with mythical creatures. Available on both desktops and Android, it offers an enjoyable experience for all ages who love a good challenge.
games.howToPlayText: Press and hold your finger or mouse button within the playing area to select the monster's fall trajectory. Release your finger or mouse button and the monster will fall onto the playing field!  It will be easy to connect monsters at first, but with each new one the playing field will fill up. Drop identical monsters on top of each other. When the highest-ranking monster connects, it will disappear and you will get more points.

üåø Explore stunning locations with lush forests, charming villages, secret dungeons and unknown planets. üèòüêâü™ê

Enjoy bright graphics and a delightful soundtrack that will accompany you throughout your journey.
games.howToPlayText:
Are you ready for a hidden object game that's as cute as it is challenging? Jump into "100 Hidden Capybaras" ‚Äì the ultimate hidden object adventure where your mission is to find and collect 100 adorable capybaras, each hiding in beautifully designed scenes!

üåø Explore stunning environments filled with lush forests, charming villages, secret dungeons, and unknown planets. üèòüêâü™ê

games.title: Emerland Solitaire
games.description:
Welcome to the wonderful country of Emerland! 
     Dive deep into the world of magical tale where great mages battle for the Source of the ancient magic of the Cards! Explore mysterious lands accompanied by heroes that include a noble Knight, an Elven Archeress and a mystical Sorceress to defeat the malevolent Dark Master! 
     Solve puzzles and collect combinations to complete difficult and varied levels! Get rewards and find new assistants! 
Use the left mouse button to interact with in-game UI.
games.howToPlayText:
Welcome to the wonderful country of Emerland! 
     Dive deep into the world of magical tale where great mages battle for the Source of the ancient magic of the Cards! Explore mysterious lands accompanied by heroes that include a noble Knight, an Elven Archeress and a mystical Sorceress to defeat the malevolent Dark Master! 
     Solve puzzles and collect combinations to complete difficult and varied levels! Get rewards and find new assistants! 
Use the left mouse button to interact with in-game UI.

games.title: Defender: Tanks Merge
games.description: Defender: Tanks Merge is a thrilling online strategy game where you create a powerful army by merging unique tanks with abilities. Face increasing waves of enemies, using auto-merge, bombs, and mines to strengthen your tactics. Play for free on desktop or mobile and enjoy hours of strategic fun!
games.howToPlayText:
Controls:
- Drag tanks together to merge
- Drag unwanted tanks to the trash can
- Tap ability buttons to use and select the target area
- Cancel abilities by tapping any ability button or base area
- Mines can't be placed near tanks‚Äîplan ahead

games.title: Monster Slayer. Idle Clicker
games.description: Monster Slayer is an action-packed game where you battle quirky monsters and gather valuable resources. Strengthen your hero by unlocking powerful skills and spells, capture monster souls to expand your collection, and trade Flame Shards for rare relics. Enhance your abilities with Inlay Stones and potions as you take on ever-stronger foes in your quest for victory!
games.howToPlayText:
Controls:
Use the left mouse button to interact with objects and UI elements.

games.title: Pocket Universe
games.description:
Pocket Universe is an adventure game where players build and expand their own tiny world.

1. Gather resources (wood, stone, metal, crystals) and use them to unlock new lands.

2. Discover diverse biomes: lush meadows, frozen tundras, volcanic regions, and more.

3. Upgrade your tools to harvest rare materials.

4. Face enemies ‚Äî monsters, golems, and wild creatures guarding unexplored areas.

5. Step by step, your little world will grow into a whole universe.
games.howToPlayText:
How to Play
Use the joystick to move your character. Collect resources by mining rocks, trees and crystals. Spend them to upgrade tools, unlock new hexes, explore fresh biomes and fight enemies on your way!
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/pocket-universe?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Stickman Miners Wars
games.description: Lead your stickman king to victory in Stickman Miners Wars, where strategic decision-making is key. Command an army of miners and warriors to build your forces and triumph over opponents. Upgrade your units and yourself as you gain experience, and strategically attack enemy castles while defending your own. Will your strategy lead you to dominance? Play Stickman Miners Wars now!
games.howToPlayText:
First, you need to choose the first region you want to reclaim on the global map and press the PLAY button.

After this, you will enter the level and can play as the Stickman King. To move, use the keyboard keys (arrow keys or WASD) or a joystick or mouse.

To start, go to the miner purchase zone and buy a few miners. They will begin mining gold for you, and you can mine gold alongside them. Once you have accumulated enough gold, go to the warrior purchase zone to build your army.

To send your army into attack, click the sword icon on the right or press the E key. Your goal is to first destroy the opponent‚Äôs towers and then their castle.

But be careful, as the opponent aims to do the same to your castle.

Controls:

WASD / arrow keys / drag left-click = move
Left-click = interact with the in-game buttons

games.title: Tsunami Race
games.description: Tsunami Race is an exciting online adventure game where players race against a looming tsunami. Select your character, navigate through obstacles, and compete in various game modes, including dodging fruits and racing on water slides. Experience adrenaline-pumping action without downloads or registration across multiple platforms.
games.howToPlayText: Tap and Hold on the screen to move character!

games.title: Left 4 Die
games.description: Left 4 Die is an intense survival shooter set in a post-apocalyptic environment. Utilize strategy to face endless enemies in this web-based game with stunning graphics and responsive controls. Experience the excitement across various devices as you navigate dangers, wield formidable weapons, and adapt to survive.
games.howToPlayText: WASD - move Left Mouse button - attack R - reload SPACE - jump 1 - 4 - select weapons. Approach the weapons dealer to buy weapons, the armor dealer - to buy armor, the barber - to change your appearance, the commander - to receive a new mission. Complete missions and kill zombies to earn money and experience. The higher your level, the more powerful equipment and higher rewards for missions you can obtain, but you will also face more numerous hordes of zombies chasing you.

games.title: ENDLESS Z SURVIVOR
games.description:
Fight through endless waves of hungry zombies, unleash your arsenal of weapons, survive!
Each time you perish, you only get stronger. Kill zombies, get gold, buy new weapons, kill more zombies!!
games.howToPlayText:
Keyboard Controls:

Move - WSAD keys

Reload - R key

Shoot - Left Mouse Button (LMB)

Switch Weapons - Number Keys 1-2

games.title: Bobr turbo: craft cars
games.description:
Dive into a world where imagination meets destruction! In this action-packed builder game, your mission is clear: create, upgrade, and dominate. Construct powerful battle machines from a wide variety of blocks, customize them to your style, craft new parts, and prove your engineering skills in intense arena showdowns.

üí° Create Your Own War Machines

With an arsenal of blocks, boosters, and weapons at your fingertips, design machines that are as deadly as they are unique. Upgrade your parts to make your builds tougher, faster, and more destructive!

üõ†Ô∏è Craft, Customize, Compete

Collect loot from chests to enhance your arsenal and push your creativity to the limit. Fine-tune your machines to outperform the competition!

üî• Outsmart and outbuild your rivals. Wreck your enemies in spectacular auto-battles and rise to the top. Only the best engineers will claim victory!

Are you ready for the challenge? Prove your skills, show off your creativity, and become the ultimate battle machine builder!
games.howToPlayText:
Your goal is to collect a fighting machine from inventory blocks. Controls: PC - left mouse button, phone - touch the screen.
Fighting takes place automatically.

games.title: Kingdom Defender - Tower Defense
games.description:
Get ready for an exciting adventure where you must defend your kingdom from hordes of orcs, trolls, evil undead, and other vile creatures using towers and special abilities!

Fight in forests, mountains, and deserts, adapting your defensive strategy to the conditions with various upgrades and tower abilities! Summon flames beneath your enemies feet or freeze them, call in reinforcements, and battle legendary monsters to protect the kingdom from dark forces!

GAME FEATURES:
‚Ä¢ Epic defensive battles that can captivate you for hours on end
‚Ä¢ A variety of special tower upgrades and abilities to help you change your strategy
‚Ä¢ Different enemies with unique skills, ranging from goblins to mighty undead
‚Ä¢ Intense boss fights never before seen in the tower defense genre
‚Ä¢ Extra difficulty levels that challenge your tactical skills
‚Ä¢ Built-in encyclopedia with descriptions of towers and special abilities
games.howToPlayText: Place towers to stop incoming enemies. Activate abilities at the right moment to turn the tide of battle. Build your defense strategy and don't let the enemies breach the kingdom!
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/kingdom-defender-tower-defense?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Obby: Warriors of The Sword
games.description:
Become a hero in Obby: Warriors of The Sword! Collect powerful swords, defeat enemies and unlock new abilities! Go through rebirth and become a legend. Get stronger, pump up your hero and become the best in this exciting game!

Key Game Features:

‚öîÔ∏è Epic Battles: Upgrade your hero, unlock new abilities and fight unique enemies! üïπÔ∏è

üí• Sword and Artifact Collection: Buy, upgrade and collect different swords to create the strongest hero with powerful weapons! üó°Ô∏èüíé

üí™ Allies and Reborn: Make loyal allies and go through rebirth, becoming even stronger and opening new battle opportunities. ü§ùüîÑ

üòé Endless customizations: You can choose from a variety of skins, pets and jewelry to make your hero unique and truly stylish! üé®üêæ‚ú®

üëë Missions and Challenges: Complete exciting missions, unlock new levels and get rare rewards. üéØüèÖ
games.howToPlayText:
üíªDesktop:

WASD - Movement
LMB - Take a hit
Space - Jump
RMB and mouse movement - Camera rotation

üì± Smartphone:

Movement - Joystick on the left side of the screen
Rotate the camera - Finger movements on the right side of the screen
Click on the screen - Take a shot

games.title: Geometry Open World
games.description: Dive into the exciting realm of Geometry Open World, a dynamic 2D action game. Steer your vessel through challenging terrains, face various foes, and confront tough bosses. Utilize upgrades and skills to secure triumph. Ready to dominate this geometrical adventure? Enjoy it for free on your devices!
games.howToPlayText:
Controls
A or left arrow key = move left
D or right arrow key = move right
Q = use shield
E = use cannons
Left mouse button = interact with in-game UI

games.title: Heroic Knight
games.description: Heroic Knight is an exciting puzzle adventure where you lead a brave knight through challenging landscapes to find treasures and earn glory. Playable directly in your browser, this free game offers thrilling medieval quests, clever puzzles, and action against enemies, perfect for both mobile and desktop players.
games.howToPlayText: In order for the prince to save the princess or to reach the gold, you need to develop your strategy and pull the right sticks in time. Otherwise, the trolls may kill you or you may die in the lava.

games.title: Palkovil The Way Home
games.description: The unique world of "Palkovil" will allow you to immerse yourself in the crazy atmosphere of the New Year! Hundreds of monsters and mobs, favorite animals, fascinating riddles and quests, gifts, toys and sweets, huge laboratory spaces will help you learn the most terrible secrets of this place! Collect toys, feed squirrels, dogs and cats, fight with swords, defeat bosses, collect cards by looking at paintings, find connections and do everything to bring the Christmas tree home. Save your favorite holiday together with the heroes of this game.
games.howToPlayText:
The main task of this quest is to bring the Christmas tree back home. Do everything so that the aliens can not spoil the holiday.
Turn on the lights in the right rooms to move around the laboratory. Fulfill the tasks of the aliens to get toys. Collect the whole collection of unique souvenirs to please your friends with beautiful gifts!

games.title: Cowboys Duel
games.description: Enter the rugged world of the Wild West in *Cowboys Duel*, where sharp aim and quick reflexes are crucial. Compete in solo missions or face off against friends in thrilling duels. Customize your character, enjoy various game modes, and hone your skills to become the top cowboy.
games.howToPlayText:
- Click on the menu and open the game

- Just Click when you want to shoot

- Watch the clock and shoot when it is 12, if you shoot before you will lose

- Click on the arrows before time runs out to turn them in the direction shown

- Download 20 Targets before time runs out

- The one who scores 3 wins.

games.title: Noob saves a girl: A Story
games.description: Join an exciting rescue adventure in "Noob Saves a Girl," a free online game. Take on the role of a passionate hero trying to save his love from a cunning villain. Enjoy thrilling battles and strategic challenges on your phone or computer in captivating settings.
games.howToPlayText:
Moving around on the computer using the mouse and keyboard.
Use the joystick to move around on mobile devices.
Defeat all the bosses!

games.title: Vikings
games.description: Battle with 8-card heroes in this epic online game! Unlock Warriors, Berserkers, Hunters & Shamans. Level up cards, collect gear, earn silver & energy, and grow your hero by completing raids and daily quests. Start your adventure now!
games.howToPlayText: All heroes have 8 cards in the battle. There are 4 types of cards: Warriors, Berserkers, Hunters and Shamans. Simple cards (warriors) attack only with swords. To unlock the ability to attack with other cubes, it is necessary to increase the number of stars on the map, and chests will help in this. Also, as the stars increase, the damage it causes increases. The level of the card cannot be higher than the level of the hero, to increase the level of the card, you need the appropriate experience banks. All banks can be used only for simple cards. By putting on a thing, you increase the health of your hero. By wearing all 6 items, you can increase the hero's rank, which will also add health. If you don't have enough silver, use the wheel (by clicking on the silver from above), you can also find silver in the maze. You can gain experience for the hero level by completing daily tasks and winning raids. In the vastness of the game, you can get cans of energy to use them - click on the energy icon.
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/vikings-975a-1?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>
